SEARCH
Package org.bluezoo.gumdrop.imap.handler

Interface SelectedHandler

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultIMAPHandler
public interface SelectedHandler
Handler for IMAP SELECTED state commands.

This handler receives commands when a mailbox is selected (RFC 9051 Section 3.3). The client can now access messages in the selected mailbox.

Methods receive the MailboxStore established at login and the currently selected Mailbox. This allows the handler to:

  • Access the current mailbox for message operations
  • Access other mailboxes (e.g., COPY/MOVE targets)
  • Manage the mailbox hierarchy

Protocol-level commands (CAPABILITY, NOOP, LOGOUT, NAMESPACE) are handled automatically by the server.

Policy decisions in selected state:

  • FETCH/SEARCH - message access (logging, auditing)
  • STORE - modify message flags (write access check)
  • COPY/MOVE - copy/move messages (destination access check)
  • EXPUNGE - remove deleted messages (write access check)
  • CLOSE/UNSELECT - deselect mailbox
  • STATUS - mailbox status access
  • Mailbox management - CREATE/DELETE/RENAME/SUBSCRIBE
  • APPEND - message delivery
  • QUOTA - quota management
Author:
Chris Burdess
See Also:
  • SelectState.selectOk(org.bluezoo.gumdrop.mailbox.Mailbox, boolean, java.util.Set<org.bluezoo.gumdrop.mailbox.Flag>, java.util.Set<org.bluezoo.gumdrop.mailbox.Flag>, int, int, long, long, org.bluezoo.gumdrop.imap.handler.SelectedHandler)

    • select

      void select(MailboxStore store, String mailboxName, SelectState state)
      Called when the client sends SELECT command.
      Parameters:
      store - the user's mailbox store
      mailboxName - the mailbox name to select
      state - operations for responding

    • append

      void append(MailboxStore store, String mailboxName, Set<Flag> flags, OffsetDateTime internalDate, AppendState state)
      Called when the client sends APPEND command.
      Parameters:
      store - the user's mailbox store
      mailboxName - the target mailbox
      flags - optional flags for the message
      internalDate - optional internal date
      state - operations for receiving the message literal

    • getQuota

      void getQuota(QuotaManager quotaManager, MailboxStore store, String quotaRoot, QuotaState state)
      Called when the client sends GETQUOTA command.
      Parameters:
      quotaManager - the server's quota manager (may be null if not configured)
      store - the user's mailbox store
      quotaRoot - the quota root name
      state - operations for responding

    • setQuota

      void setQuota(QuotaManager quotaManager, MailboxStore store, String quotaRoot, Map<String,Long> resourceLimits, QuotaState state)
      Called when the client sends SETQUOTA command.
      Parameters:
      quotaManager - the server's quota manager (may be null if not configured)
      store - the user's mailbox store
      quotaRoot - the quota root name
      resourceLimits - the resource limits (resource name to limit value)
      state - operations for responding

    • close

      void close(Mailbox mailbox, CloseState state)
      Called when the client sends CLOSE command.

      CLOSE implicitly expunges deleted messages and returns to AUTHENTICATED state.

      Parameters:
      mailbox - the currently selected mailbox
      state - operations for responding

    • unselect

      void unselect(Mailbox mailbox, CloseState state)
      Called when the client sends UNSELECT command.

      UNSELECT returns to AUTHENTICATED state without expunging.

      Parameters:
      mailbox - the currently selected mailbox
      state - operations for responding

    • expunge

      void expunge(Mailbox mailbox, ExpungeState state)
      Called when the client sends EXPUNGE command.
      Parameters:
      mailbox - the currently selected mailbox
      state - operations for responding

    • uidExpunge

      void uidExpunge(Mailbox mailbox, MessageSet uidSet, ExpungeState state)
      Called when the client sends UID EXPUNGE command.
      Parameters:
      mailbox - the currently selected mailbox
      uidSet - the UID set of messages to expunge
      state - operations for responding

    • store

      void store(Mailbox mailbox, MessageSet messages, StoreAction action, Set<Flag> flags, boolean silent, StoreState state)
      Called when the client sends STORE command.
      Parameters:
      mailbox - the currently selected mailbox
      messages - the message sequence set
      action - the flag action (REPLACE, ADD, or REMOVE)
      flags - the flags to set/add/remove
      silent - true if .SILENT modifier was used
      state - operations for responding

    • uidStore

      void uidStore(Mailbox mailbox, MessageSet uidSet, StoreAction action, Set<Flag> flags, boolean silent, StoreState state)
      Called when the client sends UID STORE command.
      Parameters:
      mailbox - the currently selected mailbox
      uidSet - the UID set
      action - the flag action (REPLACE, ADD, or REMOVE)
      flags - the flags to set/add/remove
      silent - true if .SILENT modifier was used
      state - operations for responding

    • copy

      void copy(MailboxStore store, Mailbox mailbox, MessageSet messages, String targetMailbox, CopyState state)
      Called when the client sends COPY command.
      Parameters:
      store - the user's mailbox store (to access target mailbox)
      mailbox - the currently selected (source) mailbox
      messages - the message sequence set
      targetMailbox - the destination mailbox name
      state - operations for responding

      state - operations for responding

    • fetch

      void fetch(Mailbox mailbox, MessageSet messages, Set<String> fetchItems, FetchState state)
      Called when the client sends FETCH command.

      The handler can use this for logging or access control. Typically just calls state.proceed(this).

      Parameters:
      mailbox - the currently selected mailbox
      messages - the message sequence set
      fetchItems - the data items to fetch (FLAGS, ENVELOPE, BODY, etc.)
      state - operations for responding

    • uidFetch

      void uidFetch(Mailbox mailbox, MessageSet uidSet, Set<String> fetchItems, FetchState state)
      Called when the client sends UID FETCH command.
      Parameters:
      mailbox - the currently selected mailbox
      uidSet - the UID set
      fetchItems - the data items to fetch
      state - operations for responding

    • search

      void search(Mailbox mailbox, SearchCriteria criteria, SearchState state)
      Called when the client sends SEARCH command.

      The handler can use this for logging or access control. Typically just calls state.proceed(this).

      Parameters:
      mailbox - the currently selected mailbox
      criteria - the search criteria
      state - operations for responding
